content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 64, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_gray_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 16, "index": 43}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: The crafting recipe for green terracotta requires 8 terracotta blocks arranged in a square around a green dye. Since there are enough terracotta blocks in the inventory, I will start by moving one of them to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
